directions: Preheat oven to 350°F. Whisk 1/2 cup tomato sauce, eggs, 1 teaspoon sage, salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper in large bowl. Add ground beef, sausage, onion, bell pepper, cracker crumbs, and garlic; blend well. Pack mixture into 9x5x3–inch loaf pan. Mix remaining tomato sauce, 1/2 teaspoon sage, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper in small bowl; pour over meatloaf. Bake meatloaf until thermometer inserted into center registers 160°F, about 1 hour 10 minutes.
ingredients: 3/4 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper, divided
1/2 cup finely crushed crackers (such as Ritz)
title: Sausage and Bell Pepper Meatloaf
